title: them by section 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Children, Equality, Disability,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Children, Equality, Disability, 

Integration and Youth (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited child equality disability integration youth (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020

title: them by section 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth conferred 
on him by or under the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to 
Anne Rabbitte, Minister of State at the Department of Children, Equality, 
Disability, Integration and Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [739] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister child equality disability integration youth conferred enactment specified schedule delegated anne rabbitte minister state department child equality disability integration youth notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th january 2021 739 3

title: them by section 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act
heading: National Disability Authority Act 1999 (No. 14 of 1999)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

National Disability Authority Act 1999 (No. 14 of 1999) 

Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) 

Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) Act 2015 (No. 64 of 2015) 

Irish Sign Language Act 2017 (No. 40 of 2017) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
